Hey all,

What you think about adding travel from one solar system to another, and even more, traveling to another galaxy, black hole, etc.. ?

Colonizing another planets.

I think it would be really awesome

I know that we at moment dont know much about hyperspace and wormholes, but Astrophysics already proved that worm holes exists, only they are very small, and they at moment dont know the way to collect them into one big wormhole.

But we also dont need wormhole to travel to another galaxy or solar system, we can do it even now reaching sun escape velocity, but travel would be really long, so we need another way of more efficient and stronger propulsion that would bring us to much greater speeds of travel, like 10-20 or maybe 50% speed of light.

Need bigger worms.

Even at 50% S.O.L. (approx 150,000 km/s) it would still take about 10 years to reach our closest neighbouring solar system, Alpha Centauri. :|

So if we translate that into stock KSP scale... at 50% light speed it would be a years journey..

As far as I know, there's mods that implement everything you're requesting. Maybe not galaxies but definitely Interstellar, RoverDude has an Albucierre warp drive, and I'm sure I saw wormholes somewhere.
Check What not to suggest thread before posting. It was suggested a lot of times and propably won't be added, KSP Interstellar mod does great
